results.name: a(n) is the number of ways 2n-1 seats can be occupied by at most n people for n>=1, with a(0)=1.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..366
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: Central terms of triangle A086885 (after initial term).
a(n) = n! * [x^n] exp(x/(1 - x))/(1 - x)^n. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 02 2017
a(n) = n! * pollaguerre(n, n-1, -1). - _Seiichi Manyama_, May 01 2021
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Nov 22 2008
